valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 20 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 21 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Shannon 985 expected just west of Rockall 974 by 0600 tomorrow. Low mid-Atlantic 979, expected Shannon 970 by same time
